columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the GlueJob.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the GlueJob.

columns.name: allocated_capacity
columns.description: [DEPRECATED] This column has been deprecated and will be removed in a future release, use max_capacity instead. The number of Glue data processing units (DPUs) that can be allocated when this job runs.

columns.name: created_on
columns.description: The time and date that this job definition was created.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description of the job.

columns.name: glue_version
columns.description: Glue version determines the versions of Apache Spark and Python that Glue supports.

columns.name: last_modified_on
columns.description: The last point in time when this job definition was modified.

columns.name: log_uri
columns.description: This field is reserved for future use.

columns.name: max_capacity
columns.description: The number of Glue data processing units (DPUs) that can be allocated when this job runs.

columns.name: max_retries
columns.description: The maximum number of times to retry this job after a JobRun fails.

columns.name: number_of_workers
columns.description: The number of workers of a defined workerType that are allocated when a job runs.

columns.name: role
columns.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role associated with this job.

columns.name: security_configuration
columns.description: The name of the SecurityConfiguration structure to be used with this job.

columns.name: timeout
columns.description: The job timeout in minutes.

columns.name: worker_type
columns.description: The type of predefined worker that is allocated when a job runs. Accepts a value of Standard, G.1X, or G.2X.

columns.name: command
columns.description: The JobCommand that runs this job.

columns.name: connections
columns.description: The connections used for this job.

columns.name: default_arguments
columns.description: The default arguments for this job, specified as name-value pairs.

columns.name: execution_property
columns.description: An ExecutionProperty specifying the maximum number of concurrent runs allowed for this job.

columns.name: job_bookmark
columns.description: Defines a point that a job can resume processing.

columns.name: non_overridable_arguments
columns.description: Non-overridable arguments for this job, specified as name-value pairs.

columns.name: notification_property
columns.description: Specifies configuration properties of a job notification.
